item.title: 特朗普力促达成协议，伊朗离核武器还有多远？

item.title: 南非股市受美国关税打击创五年来最大跌幅
item.description: 由于美国对南非出口产品征收高额关税，企业利润和经济前景蒙上阴影，南非股市创下五年来最大跌幅。【原文：South African stocks plunged the most in five years as steep US tariffs on the country’s exports cloud the outlook for corporate profits and the economy.】

item.title: 特朗普贸易战牵制股市，S&P 500 指数被推至突破点
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收百年来最严厉的美国关税之后，S&P 500 指数正处于关键技术拐点的边缘，有可能出现更长期的全军覆没。【原文：The S&P 500 Index is on the brink of a crucial technical inflection point that threatens a longer-term wipeout after President Donald Trump imposed the steepest American tariffs in a century.】

item.title: 劳力士、斯沃琪面临超额关税，瑞士遭受的打击比欧盟更大
item.description: 鉴于瑞士在监管方面的轻率态度以及对欧盟的怀疑态度，人们可能以为瑞士会从唐纳德-特朗普的关税炮火中全身而退。然而，瑞士却被征收了欧洲大陆最高的关税之一，引起了关键行业的担忧。【原文：Switzerland may have expected to get off lightly from Donald Trump’s tariff salvo given its lighter touch approach to regulation and skepticism toward the European Union. Instead, it’s been slapped with one of highest levies on the continent, raising concern for key industries.】

item.title: 俄罗斯准备加强对西非军政府的军事支持
item.description: 俄罗斯已同意向马里、尼日尔和布基纳法索新组建的联合部队提供武器和军事训练。【原文：Russia has agreed to provide arms and military training to a newly formed joint force between Mali, Niger and Burkina Faso.】

item.title: 乔和特蕾西对最疯狂一天的感想
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 特朗普关税蓄意冲击全球经济核心
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普在白宫玫瑰园宣布了一波新的关税措施，这将使平均关税达到一个多世纪以来的最高水平，他的这一举动引来了助手和支持者们的欢呼和笑声。对经济学家、市场和世界其他地区而言，值得庆祝的事情却少之又少。【原文：As US President Donald Trump laid out a wave of new tariffs that will take average levies to their highest in more than a century, he drew cheers and laughs from aides and supporters in the White House Rose Garden. For economists, markets and the rest of the world, there was very little to celebrate.】

item.title: 南非贸易部长寻求与美国就关税问题举行会谈
item.description: 南非贸易部长帕克斯-陶表示，他计划访问南非第二大贸易伙伴美国，讨论特朗普政府对南非征收关税的问题。【原文：South Africa’s Trade Minister Parks Tau said he plans to visit the US, its second-largest trading partner, to discuss the tariffs imposed on the country by the Trump administration.】

item.title: 卢特尼克称外国的非关税壁垒是 "怪物
item.description: 商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）表示，外国将需要解决一系列限制美国产品进口的监管和其他政策问题，以确保免受唐纳德-特朗普总统新的互惠征税的影响。【原文：Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick said that foreign nations will need to address a host of regulatory and other policies limiting imports of American products in order to secure relief from President Donald Trump’s new reciprocal levies.】

item.title: 惠誉下调中国评级，因财政疲软和债务担忧
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）下调了中国的长期外币发行人违约评级，原因是担心中国的公共财政状况日益恶化，公共债务不断增加。【原文：Fitch Ratings downgraded China’s long-term foreign-currency issuer default rating on concerns of the country’s weakening public finances and rising public debt.】

item.title: 人工智能视频初创公司 Runway 在新一轮融资中估值 30 亿美元
item.description: Runway AI 公司在新一轮融资中筹集了 3.08 亿美元，使公司估值翻了一番多；这表明投资者对开发可生成视频的人工智能软件的初创公司充满热情。【原文：Runway AI Inc. has raised $308 million in a new round of funding that more than doubles the company’s valuation — a sign of investor enthusiasm for startups building artificial intelligence software that can generate videos.】

item.description: 在经受了唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易关税和欧佩克+决定比之前宣布的更快增产的双重打击后，石油跌幅创下 2023 年以来最大。【原文：Oil tumbled the most since 2023 after enduring a twin hit from President Donald Trump’s trade tariffs and an OPEC+ decision to increase output faster than previously announced.】

item.title: 美国连续申请失业救济人数升至 2021 年 11 月以来最高点
item.description: 美国失业救济金的经常性申请人数升至2021年11月以来的最高点，这进一步表明失业人员重新就业变得更加困难。【原文：Recurring applications for US unemployment benefits rose to the highest since November 2021, adding to signs it’s proving more difficult for out-of-work people to reenter the workforce.】

item.title: 价格和产量下降导致俄罗斯石油税收下滑
item.description: 由于产量下降和全球原油价格下跌，俄罗斯上个月从石油税中获得的收入减少了。【原文：Russia reaped less money from oil taxes last month as production fell and global crude prices declined.】

item.title: 美国贸易逆差因出口增长而缩小，进口仍保持高位
item.description: 美国 2 月份的贸易赤字较年初创下的纪录有所减少，原因是强劲的出口缓解了在特朗普政府全面征收关税之前抢购商品和材料的影响。【原文：The US trade deficit shrank in February from a record at the start of the year as stronger exports blunted the impact of a rush to secure goods and materials before the Trump administration’s sweeping tariffs.】

item.title: 关税威胁加剧，加拿大贸易收支转为赤字
item.description: 由于特朗普政府的关税威胁和实施开始重新划分全球贸易流，加拿大对其最大客户美国以及其他国家的出口在 2 月份大幅下滑。【原文：Canada’s exports to its biggest customer, the US, as well as other countries plunged in February, as threats and implementation of the Trump administration’s tariffs started to redraw global trading flows.】

item.title: 特朗普给中国习近平一个机会，让他赢得受关税冲击的世界
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普决定提高对几乎所有国家的关税，这将对中国经济造成打击。但这也给了习近平一个难得的机会来全面深化关系，包括与美国在亚洲和其他地区的主要盟友的关系。【原文：Donald Trump’s decision to boost tariffs on almost every country will deal a blow to China’s economy. But it’s also handing Xi Jinping a rare opening to deepen relationships across the board, including with key US allies in Asia and beyond.】

item.title: 特朗普关税将使美股损失近 2 万亿美元
item.description: 由于担心唐纳德-特朗普总统新一轮的全面关税措施可能会使经济陷入衰退，周四开盘时，S&P 500 指数将减少约 1.7 万亿美元。【原文：Roughly $1.7 trillion is set to be erased from the S&P 500 Index when trading opens Thursday amid worries that President Donald Trump’s sweeping new round of tariffs could plunge the economy into a recession.】

item.title: Verizon 推出新福利在紧张市场中争取用户
item.description: Verizon Communications Inc. 承诺提供三年价格保证和免费电话以旧换新服务，作为其最新产品的一部分，旨在吸引新客户，并在竞争激烈的无线市场上留住现有客户。【原文：Verizon Communications Inc. is promising a three-year price guarantee and a free phone trade-in as part of its latest offerings, designed to lure new customers and keep existing ones in a fiercely competitive wireless market.】

item.title: 股价暴跌，杰克-多西的区块链公司进军银行业
item.description: 近十年来，Cai Haun 一直是 Cash App 的忠实用户。她先是用 Block Inc. 的应用程序来存储以前当咖啡师时赚到的小费，现在则用来收发朋友寄来的酒钱和集体聚餐的钱。【原文：Cai Haun has been a loyal Cash App user for nearly a decade. First using Block Inc.’s app as a place to squirrel away tips from her previous job as a barista, and now to send and receive money from friends for drinks and group dinners.】

item.title: 欧洲央行官员认为 4 月份可选择降息或暂停降息
item.description: 根据欧洲中央银行 3 月份会议的记录，该行官员认为下一次制定政策时，要么再次降息，要么按兵不动。【原文：European Central Bank officials saw either another reduction in interest rates or a hold as possible when they next set policy, according to an account of their March meeting.】

item.title: TikTok 因向中国发送欧盟数据面临 5 亿多欧元罚款
item.description: TikTok 的所有者字节跳动有限公司（ByteDance Ltd.）因将欧洲用户的数据非法运送到中国，将被处以超过 5 亿欧元（约合 5.53 亿美元）的隐私保护罚款，这加剧了全球对该视频共享应用程序日益强烈的反感。【原文：TikTok owner ByteDance Ltd. is set to be hit by a privacy fine of more than €500 million ($553 million) for illegally shipping European users’ data to China, adding to the growing global backlash over the video-sharing app.】

item.title: 破获特拉菲古拉公司的瑞士总检察长希望获得美国式权力
item.description: 瑞士最高检察官呼吁立法者赋予他美国式的广泛权力和更多的调查人员，以便更快地对违法公司绳之以法。【原文：Switzerland’s top prosecutor has called on legislators to give him sweeping US-style powers and more investigators to dole out faster justice to errant companies.】

item.title: 欧佩克+加速增加供应，油价跌势加剧
item.description: 欧佩克+同意在 5 月份增加石油供应，增幅超过预期，加深了唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税所引发的油价下滑。【原文：OPEC+ agreed to make a larger than expected oil supply hike in May, deepening the slump in oil prices triggered by President Donald Trump’s tariffs.】

item.title: 马斯克的 "DOGE 支出斧头 "悬在科技股头上
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）削减 1 万亿美元联邦支出的努力为饱受打击的科技投资者增添了另一个风险，有可能使这个本已岌岌可危的行业失去数十亿美元的收入。【原文：Elon Musk’s efforts to slash $1 trillion in federal spending adds another risk for battered tech investors, threatening to sap billions in revenue from an already precarious sector.】
